a.js(6,22): error TS8016: Type assertion expressions can only be used in TypeScript files.
a.js(9,22): error TS8016: Type assertion expressions can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== a.js (2 errors) ====
    /**
     * @typedef Foo
     * @property {number} [foo]
     */
    
    const x = /** @type {Foo} */ ({});
                         ~~~
!!! error TS8016: Type assertion expressions can only be used in TypeScript files.
    x.foo; // number | undefined
    
    const y = /** @type {Required<Foo>} */ ({});
                         ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8016: Type assertion expressions can only be used in TypeScript files.
    y.foo; // number
